TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IExtendPropertySheet

Docs.summary: Enables a snap-in component to add property pages to the property sheet of an item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about programming with the IExtendPropertySheet interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

Docs.summary: Adds pages to a property sheet.
Docs.returns: | Return Value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | The CreatePropertyPages successfully added the property sheet pages. | | S\_FALSE | The CreatePropertyPages added no property sheet pages. | | E\_UNEXPECTED | An unexpected error occurred. | | E\_INVALIDARG | One or more parameters are not valid. |

Docs.summary: Determines whether the object requires pages.
Docs.returns: | Return Value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | Properties exist for this data object. | | E\_UNEXPECTED | An unexpected error occurred. | | E\_INVALID | The parameter is not valid. | | Any other error code | No pages are supplied for the data object. |
